enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the class attribute of elements, making them complementary for setting up test cases.
The toggleClass method also modifies the class attribute, which can be useful for setting up scenarios where classes are toggled before being removed.
The hasClass method can be used to verify that the specified class has been successfully removed from the elements.
The attr method can be used to verify the state of the class attribute after the removeClass method has been called.
